answers.answer: Im 38weeks. They wont let me go over 39

I have early signs of preeclampsia and will know on Monday if I'm being induced or not (I believe I am) I'm 38 weeks and 6 days and I'm really nervous about being induced as well. There are some other posts on here about being induced, take a look at them but I'm going to BUMP this post and follow it as well :)Just know you aren't alone and I feel the same exact way. Message me if you need too X

I was induce with my first because high blood pressure she was born at 37week , she was perfect im pregnant now with my second so i have nothing to comper too but was not so but i just heard that when u induce your contractions became stronger faster my hurt alot but i got from 1,5 cm to 10 in 2 hours so that make sense they got strong fastGood luck and dont worry to much

In my first pregnancy i developed preeclampsia near the end of my pregnancy. I was scheduled to.be induced at 38 weeks byt ended up going into labour at 37 weeks. I was given picotin after my labour had already started and it made my contractions stronger and faster to the point where i wasnt getting a break in between them. But it made my labour go quickly. Im not sure what its like to be given the meds before labour starts but it will just start your labour off strong. Good luck ladies, youll meet your babes soon!

question: Im being induced in 6days. Im so nervous. Who has been induced and what was it like? Also whos got pre eclampsia? ...Im freaking out about labor. And the birth. :/
title: being induced. preeclampsia.
